author: Andreas Noren
description: Bartending law would stipulate this cocktail be stirred. If law-abiding then serve on-the-rocks with larger (60ml whisky, 15ml Chartreuse, 10ml sugar, and 2 dashes bitters) measures. However, this digestif is best enjoyed straight-up whilst still alive and foaming from the shake.
name: Broadmoor cocktail
